channel.title: Flawlscape|Great pking|Great updates|Great staff!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/snmkai4kopie.png[/img] Play now! [url=http://vote-flawlscape.tk/webclient.html]FlawlScape - Webclient[/url] Forums! [url=http://flawlscape.boards.net/]Home | FlawlScape[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img] [URL=http://"https://mega.co.nz/#!IYN1TBwR!WP7BGSp9znWtwWJOxnJe8Hw30kln5rm_tCd-cL4b70M"]https://mega.co.nz/#!IYN1TBwR!WP7BGSp9znWtwWJOxnJe8Hw30kln5rm_tCd-cL4b70M[/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img]
__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ________________________________
FlawlScape is a server focused mostly on PKing. To ensure awesome PKing experiences, we do have smoothly switching for briders, perfectly working specials and the newest PK items like Chaotic Weapons or Nex gears. In addition we have a PK shop in which you can buy items like Godswords, also we have an EP drops system which works exactly as it did on RuneScape.
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n3e.jpg[/img]
We're having friendly and active staff you may always ask when having a problem or chat with when you feel like talking. What's special about us, is that we try our best to pay attention to the players' opinions and suggestions, rather than what WE want. __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ _________________________________
Apart of our decent PvP system, we also offer PvM also against Bossmonsters like Tormented Demons, the Corporeal Beast or the Gwd Monsters. [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n4e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n1e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n6e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n5e.jpg[/img]
__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ___________________________________
In general we also have a few customized Interfaces to increase the gameplay of our players even more.
Player Information menu | Custom Options menu | PK Supplies menu
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/55403892.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/ppl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z393/hellproof1/yeee-1.jpg[/img]
For the players that don't like to spend their time on getting Items for PKing, we have added basic PKing equipments into the starter's bank.
[IMG]http://i842.photobucket.com/albums/zz344/Ferity1/n7.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/4900/flawlscapejpegphixr.jpg[/img]
But of course, Screenshots don't present our unique gameplay, so why don't you test it yourself?
If you do have any questions, feel free to ask. ;-) Feedback is also always welcome, also negative if it's not connected with flame.[/CENTER]

item.title: Flawlscape|Great pking|Great updates|Great staff!
item.dc:creator: @pkerrr pkerrr
item.description:
@pkerrr wrote:

[CENTER]

snmkai4kopie.png756×103

Play now! FlawlScape - Webclient
Forums! Home | FlawlScape
https://mega.co.nz/#!IYN1TBwR!WP7BGSp9znWtwWJOxnJe8Hw30kln5rm_tCd-cL4b70M

FlawlScape is a server focused mostly on PKing. To ensure awesome PKing experiences, we do have smoothly switching for briders, perfectly working specials and the newest PK items like Chaotic Weapons or Nex gears.
In addition we have a PK shop in which you can buy items like Godswords, also we have an EP drops system which works exactly as it did on RuneScape.

We’re having friendly and active staff you may always ask when having a problem or chat with when you feel like talking. What’s special about us, is that we try our best to pay attention to the players’ opinions and suggestions, rather than what WE want.

Apart of our decent PvP system, we also offer PvM also against Bossmonsters like Tormented Demons, the Corporeal Beast or the Gwd Monsters.



In general we also have a few customized Interfaces to increase the gameplay of our players even more.

Player Information menu | Custom Options menu | PK Supplies menu

55403892.png732×335

yeee-1.jpg756×200

For the players that don’t like to spend their time on getting Items for PKing, we have added basic PKing equipments into the starter’s bank.

But of course, Screenshots don’t present our unique gameplay, so why don’t you test it yourself?

If you do have any questions, feel free to ask.
Feedback is also always welcome, also negative if it’s not connected with flame.[/CENTER]
